name: ROC-VWMA Intraday Momentum 5-Min
description: Intraday momentum strategy for large-cap U.S. equities on 5-minute bars. Uses 10-period Rate-of-Change, 20-period Volume-Weighted Moving Average, and a volume surge filter for entries; exits on ROC/VWMA reversals, 0.75 % fixed-percent trailing stop proxy, or 2 % profit target. Fixed-fractional sizing risks 1 % of equity per position.
